body: i’m thankful i woke up before my alarm, even though i did not want to wake up before my alarm, because it meant i was awake during a short break in the endless heavy rain and could take miso out.
normalized_markdown: i’m thankful i woke up before my alarm, even though i did not want to wake up before my alarm, because it meant i was awake during a short break in the endless heavy rain and could take miso out.
